nodes.question: Is there a dress code?
nodes.answer: We suggest black tie optional or cocktail attire!

nodes.question: Can I bring a date?
nodes.answer: While we wish that we could invite everyone, if your invitation does not include "and guest" we'd prefer if it'd just be you.

nodes.question: Can I bring a different plus one?
nodes.answer: Of course! You can bring who ever you like that you will have a good time with and will enjoy the festivities of the day. We ask that you do not bring more than the allotted guest(s) for your party/family.

nodes.question: Are children welcome?
nodes.answer: Of course! Your invitation should state "and family" if we are expecting more than just you and your partner.

nodes.question: Do I have to RSVP?
nodes.answer: Yes please. We need a close to accurate count to share with the caterer and venue. We'd love to have you join us and just want to make sure we're ready for you!

nodes.question: How do I RSVP?
nodes.answer: You may RSVP with the RSVP card provided in the formal invitations. If for some reason something changes, please don't hesitate to call, text, or email the bride and groom.

nodes.question: Is there parking around the venue?
nodes.answer: Yes! There are parking spaces surrounding the venue. If you do not feel comfortable driving home, we ask that call a Lyft/Uber or have a designated driver. Please pick your vehicles up from the venue before 8 am the following Monday.

nodes.question: What time should I arrive at the ceremony?
nodes.answer: We ask that you arrive at least 15-20 minutes prior to the start of the ceremony so that you may sign in and get a good seat. Our ceremony will start promptly.

nodes.question: Will the cocktail social and reception be an open bar?
nodes.answer: Yes! We will serving wine, beer, and a signature cocktail. We ask that you drink responsibly and call a Lyft/Uber or have a designated driver if you do not feel as if you can drive home.

nodes.question: Are you registered? Where?
nodes.answer: Visit the "Registry" tab to see where we are registered! We thank you for adding to our future home!
